name: Real Bottle Sniper
description:
You will feel real enjoyment with shooting zone atmosphere by play Real Bottle Sniper. Raise up your shooting abilities or skills to become a shooter champion by targeting the bottles.

FEATURES:
Realistic bottle smashing sounds
Different but interesting thrilling levels
Every mission has complexity for real shooter
Amazing 3D graphics and sound effects
Easy to play but difficult to master game
Challenging, incredible and smooth game play
